title: Taos
description: Tumultuous human drama unfolds across a province as vast as old Spain itself -- a land rich with the heritage of two civilizations and drenched in the blood of both -- as a fiercely courageous man leads his people against those who destroy their gods and their lives, and as an unforgettable woman with a dream of her own wields the very forces of history to make her dream come true.
author: Irwin R. Blacker
